attributes.action: Offer Alcohol courses to thouse in Custody !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When going into custody (prison) you can not do any offending courses if you only use alcohol, you have to be doing drugs aswell to be able to get on a course, surly as "alcohol" is the 4th most dangerous drug there should be a course just for people with an alcohol problem
